nodes.title: Move CI from internal jenkins to Github Action
Move CI from internal jenkins to Github Action
Allow user to configure batch size & delay
Prepare release by add -SNAPSHOT suffix in version
Various fixes for build, admin, and multiple schema sink
[Catalog] Fix table schema upload for single field table
Fix NPE for generic type sink
Cache pulsar client with configurable size
Make sure case sensitive conf for producer and reader works
Enable pulsar as table source and sink
Enables Pulsar as Streaming Source and Sink in Flink DataStream

change pulsarOptions related table to PulsarTableOptions
fix topic and key extractor for stream
update pulsar version to 2.7.0 for Flink-1.11
change pulsarOptions related table to PulsarTableOptions

check flink format which pulsar compatibility.
fix #193: Add watermark support for dynamictable

fix shapshot state oom for flink 1.9

fix the test of FlinkPulsarITest#testStartFromLatest in flink 1.11

support Flink 1.11 and using flink-sql DDL to operate with pulsar

add feature: enable earliest with external subscription mode

set subscription role to subscriptionName if user not set

fix: pulsar with flink debezium-json format bug
Fix the submitted cursor does not meet the pulsar subscription expectations.
fix #366: stream failure if the topic doesn't exist with Pulsar 2.8.0
fix repeat consumption when external-sub used
feat #275: add ThreadSafeDeserializationSchema solve thread safe
fixbug #237: NotSerializableException in submitting flink job
Auto release pulsar-flink on Maven Central after the uploading

change failonwrite default value is true

support use other docker image prefix
fix cursor not available when restore state
CI: Make the pull_request event available on each branch

Clean up the shell scripts and pom.xml files

add save schema on catalog creating table.
